info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 6 at 2:01PM PDT until May 6 at 4:30PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
FFWVEF
The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Central Clark County in southern Nevada...
* Until 430 PM PDT.
* At 201 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Henderson, Boulder City, Lake Las Vegas, Las Vegas Bay, Sam Boyd Stadium, Green Valley, East Las Vegas, Railroad Pass, Las Vegas Bay Campground, Boulder Beach and Boulder Beach Campground.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:30 PM PDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 4:30 PM PDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:30 PM PDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:30 PM PDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
